content: delicate crochet baby blankets can be made in simple double crochets and chains too you don t need a lot of complex stitching to produce a treasured baby shower gift never underestimate the power of embellishment this crochet baby blanket is easily embellished with flowers and leaves to create your own one-of-a-kind project >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //makeitcrochet com/blue-roses-baby-blanket-free-crochet-pattern/
